name: Lethe (itch)
description:
Lethe is a 3D Exploration Game where the player must navigate a maze-like landscape, and avoid the various hazards contained within.

You are a reconnaissance robot on a mission to scout out and evaluate the safety of an unexplored planet in a newly discovered system.
The system's star died long ago, leaving the planet's surface cold and dark.
So dark in fact, that it's rendered your camera's useless. Without reliable vision, you must rely on your other sensors to 'see' . 

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Space Bar - Activate your EchoLocation Sensor

Hold Right Mouse Button + Move Mouse - Move the Camera

CREDITS

Ben Mitchell - Programming

Lorenzo Figini - Programming

Matas Šegždavičius - 3D Modelling

Daniel Kirkpatrick - Level & Audio Design

This game was made as part of Moray Game Jam 2018, a 48 hour competition where teams of up to 5 work together to create a video/board game based on a theme revealed at the start of the Jam.
Lethe was the winner of the Video Game Category.

Please note that this project is currently a prototype, and therefore only has a single level, is not completely bug free and is not optimized. 
If you have any feedback or questions about the game, please let us know in the comments below!
